code: import{getAuth,GoogleAuthProvider,signInWithPopup,signInWithEmailAndPassword,createUserWithEmailAndPassword,signOut,onAuthStateChanged,updateProfile}from'firebase/auth';import app from'./firebase';export const auth=getAuth(app);const googleProvider=new GoogleAuthProvider();export function observeAuthState(callback){return onAuthStateChanged(auth,callback);}export async function signInWithGoogle(){const result=await signInWithPopup(auth,googleProvider);return result.user;}export async function emailSignIn(email,password){const{user}=await signInWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password);return user;}export async function emailSignUp(_ref){let{name,email,password}=_ref;const{user}=await createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password);if(name){await updateProfile(user,{displayName:name});}return user;}export async function logout(){await signOut(auth);}
